T02TD2754E:134a-0: @134a * // thugs rje chen po mkha' spyod yul can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2754E:134a-2: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dri ma med //
T02TD2754E:134a-3: ces 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2754E:134a-4: ngo mtshar bsod nams brgya yi pha rol phyin //
T02TD2754E:134a-5: snang dang mi snang dmigs pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2754E:134a-6: spyod yul las dben gcig min du ma'i tshul //
T02TD2754E:134a-7: bde chen nam mkha' dri med thub la 'dud //
T02TD2754E:134a-8: dmigs pa byed pa stong phrag mang po dang //
T02TD2754E:134a-9: gang zhig bdag tu lta ba mi bzad pas //
T02TD2754E:134a-10: blo gros 'chal pa don ma mthong ba rnams //
T02TD2754E:134a-11: gnas 'dir nam mkha' dri med bsgom par bya //
T02TD2754E:134a-12: yul dang dus dang rang bzhin gang //
T02TD2754E:134a-13: ji lta ji tsam ci zhig ni //
T02TD2754E:134a-14: de na de tshe de nyid des //
T02TD2754E:134a-15: de ltar de tsam de med nyid //
T02TD2754E:134a-16: blo gros sbyangs pa rnam kun du //
T02TD2754E:134a-17: chos kun dmigs pa med shes pa //
T02TD2754E:134a-18: de ni yang dag lha mchog mthong //
T02TD2754E:134a-19: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o //
T02TD2754E:134a-20: hr'i: gzhan ni cig shos blo can de //
T02TD2754E:134a-21: sprin bral gsal ba'i mkha' dbyings su //
T02TD2754E:134a-22: zla ba'i mdog can padma'i phyag / rjes su skye dang gzhig par bya //
T02TD2754E:134a-23: dag pa'i nam mkha' ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2754E:134a-24: bskyed pa'i rim pas gzhan gyur te //
T02TD2754E:134a-25: rjes su gzhig pas de stong 'gyur //
T02TD2754E:134a-26: bla ma'i drin thob rdo rje'i blo //
T02TD2754E:134a-27: mthong bas grub dang gzhig pa na //
T02TD2754E:134a-28: med ces rnam par rtog par zad //
T02TD2754E:134a-29: rtog pa de yang dmigs su med //
T02TD2754E:134a-30: byis pas brtags te gsum spyad pa //
T02TD2754E:134a-31: mkhas pas de nyid gcig mi dmigs //
T02TD2754E:134b-0: gdod nas ma skyes bskyed @134b pa'i rim //
T02TD2754E:134b-1: nam yang mi 'jig rjes su gzhig / de ltar 'khor gsum bzhi gsum gyis //
T02TD2754E:134b-2: dmigs bral grub par mi 'gyur na //
T02TD2754E:134b-3: de tshe med dang yod pa dang //
T02TD2754E:134b-4: byung ba zhig pa 'ang gang zhig yin //
T02TD2754E:134b-5: rnal 'byor zab mo nam mkha' yi //
T02TD2754E:134b-6: spyod yul nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2754E:134b-7: dmigs pas phung bar gyur rnams la //
T02TD2754E:134b-8: dmigs med ston pa ngo mtshar yin //
T02TD2754E:134b-9: nam mkha' dri med kyis sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
